articles.author: Ania Nussbaum, Samy Adghirni, William Horobin
articles.title: Macron Leaves Door Open for Big M&A Plan for Europe's Economy Revival - Bloomberg
articles.description: The French President signals he’d be open to cross-border bank M&A as he sets out the case for a transformative shift in the continent’s economic model
articles.content: President Emmanuel Macron said he would be open to seeing a major French bank being taken over by a European Union rival in order to spur the deeper financial integration he sees as critical for the … [+347 chars]
